name: Mini Rappelz (MightBeChangedLater)
description:
*For Starters This is **MMoRPG** Themed map based off the popular game **Rappelz**.*

**The World Needs Hero's To Fight Back Against The Shadow**

Beautiful Worlds, Creature Companions, and Fierce **PvP** Battles!

- Deep Character Customization! 
- Tame Legendary Creatures! 
- Many Explorable Dungeons! 
- Storyline Quests! 
- AND MORE TO COME!!!!!
